Articles.Content: Is there any resource other than the wiki that more extensivley lits all the variables and functions of the api? Im looking for things like time warp control that don't have to do as much with partModule

The Object Browser in Visual Studio, or whatever its equivalent is in MonoDevelop, can list all of the available classes, methods, etc. Look for the TimeWarp class inside Assembly-CSharp.dll.

For documentation, see here and specifically here.
